授業目的: Continuation of academic writing from the Spring Semester.
到達目標:
1. Students will learn how to negotiate through email by learning negotiation skills and further polite expressions.
2. Students will continue writing to express their opinions, and/or to refer to pros and cons of the topic provided.
3. Fluency writing is practiced in order for students to get used to describing their environments, and own opinions about their daily experiences.
授業方法:
1. English is used in class.

2. Preparation before the class is essential.

3. Occasional workshops are conducted

If online learning is scheduled, the course format will be changed. Please follow your teacher’s instruction.

トピック.授業外学習2:
1. Students are requested to prepare for each lesson as instructed in the Course Outline and weekly assignments documents.

2. Occasional homework is requested to be brought into the next class (online learning will be formatted differently).
